## Carry Recipe
_Lola’s Back Carry – Base Size Minus 3 – Cross Pass + Traditional Sling Pass_

- Off center Cross Pass with short tail to hip over shoulder
- Bunched chest pass with under arm tail and across baby for Traditional Sling Pass
- Feed sling rings onto tails (or finish like Shepherd's Back Carry w/o rings)
- Tuck tails under chest pass and back through sling rings
